1112.content:
You peer around the thick circumference of a tree, your tail wound around the rough bark and draped across some of the lower branches. Down below you is a fenced in pasture, the grass waving in the breeze. Moving around in that pasture is a number of cows, you can tell that much from your perch. The bovines seem blissfully unaware of your presence as they wander about and feast on the plentiful bounty around them. Beyond the farm, you can see a bustling town, but your gnawing hunger draws your attention back to the farm below you.

Your long tongue laps at the air, bringing tastes that only further stoke your appetite. Your stomach grumbles at the thought that food is so near, yet you aren’t doing anything to consume it.

You slither back down the tree – your mind still rebelling a bit at how odd moving like that feels – and up to the fence. The cattle still remain unaware of you even now. You drop to the ground and disappear among the grass as a shout echoes across the pasture. Fear grips your mind; were you noticed, is someone going to come after you for intruding?

Edging back up so you can see, you spot a woman looking at one of the cows that wanders closer to her. Relief floods into you as you realize that she must have been calling the cow over. Proof comes as the woman leads the cow to a barn attached to the pasture. You watch her go, your eyes fixated on the woman even though you can’t make out much detail at this distance. Something about her seems off, but your stomach grumbles again, realizing food is even closer yet you continue to waste time. It’s time to do something about that nagging hunger.

"Shit, shit, we're so late !" Fulminate Filirel.

You're already dressed up, but, she still have to put on some make up and make her hairs. Which she does after half an hour or so. She comes out of the bathroom with a very fancy green dress, long, with a lot of laces that gives it volumes. She wears elvians make up and a complex hairstyle. All together is a perfect fusion between elf and human high society look.

"Let's go..." She orders.

After that you push the front door where a carriage is waiting for you. You feel stuck in your fancy clothes, but avoid to say any complains. Outside is a paved street with a lot of people walking on the sidewalk in fancy clothes. On each side of the street, grey houses like yours, stands tall and oppressing.

In the carriage, Filirel sit next to you and grab your hand with her mechanical arm, clearly trying to be as delicate as possible with it.

But as you approach of the destination, you notice the smell of fire. Filirel and you look by the window to find a crowd of people standing in front of a large house burning.

Your wife goes out in panic.
"Shit ! Joel !" She shout.

You follow her to a guard trying to maintain a safe distance to the house.
"What happened ?" She asks him.

The man look at her and instantly stiffen.
"Lady Garrael ! Hum... there was an explosion at the mayor house half an hour ago ! We don't know much, the firemen are trying to find the mayor, but with no success for now, the fire is too hot..."

Half an hour ago ? You should have been in there at that moment ! You and Filirel look at each others, you though the same thing.
133111112.title: A calm day.

choices: "I'm... not into... I'm not into women..." You hesitantly says
"Hum... sure ! Yes..." You play along.
You can't stop yourself and kiss her.
133112.content:
Slowly pushing away the sheets, you can see your body, a feminine one. It's hard to miss, really, a large pair of breasts are pushing the nightie you're wearing, the low neckline of the clothe shows a big cleavage. You sit on the edge of the bed, with slow movements and feel their weight, you don't remember such a sensation, you're pretty sure you never were so endowed. At first glance, you're probably around E-cup... but enough of that, you need to know more about yourself.

In the rising light of the morning, you look around and see a big room with strong stone walls. The huge bed is in a solid frame of wood with golden illumination and satin sheets. There are two dressers and a wardrobe with a big mirror.

You walk there, your feet feeling the wooden floor, and you can finally fully see yourself. You can see the nice curves of your body, even under the nightie. You're a little bit chubby with large hips and a thick ass. Your face is round with great feminine features impossible to miss, a small nose, big eyelashes and full lips. On each side of your face falls dark blond hairs, a little messy from the night of sleep, ending in the middle of your back.

You hoped you could recognise any detail of yourself, but nothing, you just see a stranger looking back. Who the hell are you ? A name comes to your mind. Danny. Is it yours ?

Behind you, the sun have almost fully risen from the horison. You decide then to look outside and see a big garden with part of the castle you're in. You feel like in a fairy tale, waking up in the princess bedroom, is the elf, the princess ?

You look behind you and don't see her in the bed. And you suddenly feel arms hugging you and a face pressing against your back.

"You're already up ? Stressed by the big day, my love ?" You hear in a wonderful cristal clear voice.

"The... big day ?" You asks, curious.

She laugh, a beautiful laugh.

"The wedding, silly ! Are you ready to be my wife ?" She says as she push your ribs to gently force you to look at her.

And you see her eyes, shining like a golden ring on a sea of milk and pierced by a black spot who seems to pierce through your soul. She smiles so naturaly, you could melt just at the sight of her face. She's so small, her head is at the same height of your breasts, you want to protect her from any threats that could come.
133112.title: What's going on here ?

info.brief_description: You wake up in a new world of adventure. Nothing seems right, but maybe it's for the best.
info.description:
Your life was going smoothly, or not, it's hard to remember. Even your name seems to escape your grasps, it was important... isn't it ? Oh well, if you forgot it, it wasn't that important after all.
There is more important issues here ! Like, were the hell are you ? It's not your bedroom that, you're sure of it. And it's certainly not your place of work !
info.pretty_title: A story of adventure and kinks
